name: Ragin Dungeons
description:
In a world that is quite strange and unfamiliar from reality, Gon, a regular turtle finds himself wandering into a dark creepy dungeon. 

With no memory of why he is in this place, Gon searches the dungeon to find some answers. However, he quickly experiences first hand the dangers that lurk within the shadows. 

But with darkness must come Light, right? Well Gon’s Light is pretty dim. With a broken map and a rusted sword, can Gon navigate through the dungeon and find the answers he's looking for, or will he meet a dark and gruesome fate that awaits with every step into the dungeon.
